== QEMU ==

Install [http://wiki.qemu.org/Download QEMU]

Installing GRUB on Qemu usable virtual hard disk:

 # Create a disk image (21 MB)
{{{dd if=/dev/zero of=hd0.img count=40320}}}
 # Create a partition on the disk image
{{{/sbin/fdisk hd0.img}}}
  # Setup geometry:
   * x - extra functionality
   * h 16
   * s 63
   * c 40
   * r - return to main menu
  # n, p, 1, enter, enter - create new partition
  # a 1 - make bootable
  # w - write the table to disk
 # Setup the loopback device (1048576 =  2048 x 512 bytes)
{{{losetup -o 1048576 /dev/loop0 hd0.img}}}
 # Create a file system
{{{sudo /sbin/mkfs.ext2 /dev/loop0}}}
 # Mount the image
{{{sudo mount /dev/loop0 /mnt/flash}}}
 # Install GRUB (stage1 and stage2 are from host system)
{{{
sudo mkdir -p /mnt/flash/boot/grub
sudo cp /boot/grub/stage1 /boot/grub/stage2 /mnt/flash/boot/grub
}}}
 # Put embox image
{{{cp path/embox /mnt/flash}}}
 # Unmount the disk image
{{{sudo umount /mnt/flash}}}
 # Detach the loopback device
{{{sudo /sbin/losetup -d /dev/loop0}}}
 # Setup GRUB device map
{{{
/usr/sbin/grub --device-map=/dev/null
    > device (hd0) hd0.img
    > geometry (hd0) 40 16 63
    > root (hd0,0)
    > setup (hd0)
    > quit
}}}
 # Boot using Qemu
{{{
qemu -hda hd0.img -m 256
    grub> kernel /boot/embox
    grub> boot
}}}

== SKYEYE ==

[http://sourceforge.net/projects/skyeye/files/skyeye/skyeye-1.3.0_rc1.tar.gz/download download skyeye-1.3.0rc1]

[http://sourceforge.net/projects/skyeye/files/skyeye/skyeye-1.2.6_rc1/skyeye-1.2.6_rc1.tar.bz2/download download skyeye-1.2.6rc1] (recommended)

Довольно продвинутый симулятр, поддерживает разные платформы (в основном arm семейства, из sparc только leon2), отладку по gdb, конфигурация железки задаётся в конфиге (память, сеть, uart и прочее).

Начальная поддержка embox-arm.
